name: Eastside Distilling, Inc.
description: Eastside Distilling, Inc. is a craft spirits company based in Portland, Oregon, focused on producing premium whiskey, vodka, and flavored spirits. Founded in 2008, Eastside has quickly gained a reputation for its high-quality products and innovative approach to distilling. The company specializes in small-batch production, allowing for meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to quality. Eastside's flagship product is its award-winning Portland Potato Vodka, which is made from locally sourced potatoes and distilled in small batches to ensure a smooth and rich flavor. The company also offers a range of whiskeys, including the Eastside Whiskey, which is crafted using traditional methods and a unique blend of grains. In addition to its core offerings, Eastside Distilling continually experiments with new flavors and spirits, such as its line of flavored whiskeys and seasonal releases. The company's mission is to craft exceptional spirits that embody the spirit of the Pacific Northwest while also embracing sustainable practices. With a focus on community and local sourcing, Eastside Distilling is not just a producer of spirits; it is a part of the vibrant Portland culture and craft beverage scene.
ceo: Geoffrey G. W. R. F. L. W. Miller

key_executives.name: Geoffrey G. W. R. F. L. W. Miller

seo.meta_title: Eastside Distilling, Inc. | Premium Craft Spirits

faq.question: What types of spirits does Eastside Distilling produce?
faq.answer: Eastside Distilling produces vodka, whiskey, and flavored spirits.

faq.question: Where is Eastside Distilling located?
faq.answer: Eastside Distilling is located in Portland, Oregon, USA.

faq.question: What is Eastside's flagship product?
faq.answer: Eastside's flagship product is the Portland Potato Vodka.
